item.title: Why I left my job to build in AI?
item.description:
Background

Since, this essay will be about me therefore it will involve the usage of the word “I” (which I despise) a lot.

It was in the initial few months of my junior year at BITS Pilani when I came across the word “startup”. I was immediately hooked because of the success stories of BITSian Alumni who have gone on to build successful startups and earned fortunes. So I started searching for the ways to earn money through internet. Only thing I knew at the time was “Physics/Mathematics/Chemistry” because of the JEE Advanced exam (which I had cleared with pretty good rank), I thought that I can earn money teaching the upcoming batches these subjects and so I did that.
